bug.author: awaemmanuel
bug.summary: [BUG] - Model explainability notebook fails with unreadable error
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
Running the model explainability notebook gives an error when loading.. <denchmark-code>Unreadable Notebook: /home/useradmin/sources/nlp/examples/model_explainability/understand_models.ipynb NotJSONError('Notebook does not appear to be JSON: \'{\\n "cells": [\\n {\\n "cell_type": "m...',) </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
Click on nlp/examples/model_explainability/understand_models.ipynb <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
Notebook should load without the JSON error <denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>
